page.title: 13M.25: Some attitudes.
page.content: Most people think the new motorway is a{good idea.}Some reasons are that they will be able to get to places much more quickly and there will be fewer traffic jams on the roads. There may be a few traffic jams on the motorway but not as many. It will also create{employment}for the people who are paid to build the motorway. Some reasons why the motorway is bad are that it will destroy the{wild {life,}both the plants and animals, and spoil the landscape. There may be {danger}if children go down to the main road, and there may be more accidents, because cars will be travelling much faster than on smaller roads. Generally the attitude of the locals is that it will greatly improve transport links in the area, and will take a lot of the traffic off the busy {A217,}running through Kingswood.
